title: Max Stephens talks about frameworks
brief_description: Max Stephens addresses a meeting at Horsham in June 1987 to explain the stage of development that the Curriculum frameworks project had then reached. The program outlines the basis and approach to learning emphasised by the Frameworks project and also looks at the implementation of tasks. No other credits available.
